ygData.subject: FANTASY!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone. NOT to be a spammer, but i finally have my fantasy gallery site up and running, and i though the memebers of this groups would be interested!!
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone. NOT to be a spammer, but i finally have my fantasy
gallery site up and running, and i though the memebers of this
groups would be interested!!
don't worry this isn't any of that porn crap.
www.fantasygiftgallery.com
hey, if something sparks your interest, email us under the contact
us part of the website, and i'll give you a nice discount on your
entire order!!
thanks for peeking!
because i'm NOT a spammer, you won't see this post again, so
bookmark us for christmas shopping!! New deals everyday!
